text: The Republic of India uses one time zone, which is Indian Standard Time (IST). This is 5:30 hours ahead of Coordinated Universal Time. India does not observe Daylight Saving Time (DST). == Other time zones == * Bombay Time (UTC+04:51) * Madras Time (UTC+05:21) * Calcutta Time (UTC+05:54) * Chaibagaan Time (UTC+06:30) == Related pages == * Daylight Saving Time Category:Time zones India
title: Time in India
